version_description: Quickly open any recent log day!

Quickly open any recent log day!

Fixed issue with editing log header
General release for bug fixes
Added in-motion lock screen support for DashLink vehicles, as required for ELD mandate compliance. Also included are some key bug fixes.
General release for bug fixes
General release for bug fixes

The ELD mandate is upon us!

Ensure you are ELD-compliant with the latest release of BigRoad and your FMCSA-certified DashLink. Upgrade today!

This version includes several bug fixes impacting shipping document and trailer selection, as well as improvements to DashLink connectivity.

Ensure you are ELD-compliant with the latest release of BigRoad and your FMCSA-certified DashLink. Upgrade today!

This version includes several important bug fixes, as well as improvements to DashLink connectivity.
This version of BigRoad has fixes to address product stability and DashLink reconnections to the mobile app taking a long time while driving.
This version of BigRoad has fixes to address product stability and DashLink reconnections to the mobile app taking a long time while driving.

With the BigRoad 22.0 release we have added some new features.

The highlights are:
Added the Alberta hours-of-service (HOS) rule set
Added the Canadian Federal Oilfield exemption
Added the assignment of unidentified driving
This release also includes a number of bug fixes.

With the BigRoad 22.0 release we have added some new features.

The highlights are:
Added the Alberta hours-of-service (HOS) rule set
Added the Canadian Federal Oilfield exemption
Added the assignment of unidentified driving
This release also includes a number of bug fixes.

With the BigRoad 24.0 release we have added a new feature of enabling drivers to lock the Inspection screen.  With this feature enable it will require a PIN to be entered to unlock and exit the Inspection screens.  This release includes bug fixes to address ODND events occurring when they should not.

Bug fixes/Improvements
Updated password policy

- We made some changes to Google Maps, update is required
- Bug Fixes/Improvements
- Bug Fixes/Improvements

Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Enhanced accessibility to DVIRs and bug fixes.
Bug Fixes/Improvements
Bug Fixes/Improvements

BigRoad got a new look! We revamped our navigation to put everything you need and use in one place to make things just a little bit easier for you. Your HOS are now clearly visible on the main screen. Thank you for using BigRoad. Let us know what you think and rate us on the App Store.
Bug Fixes/Improvements
Bug Fixes/Improvements
Bug Fixes/Improvements
Bug Fixes/Improvements
Added support for ELD Exempt drivers, driving an ELD truck and fixed some bugs.
When returning from time off the app will now prompt you to sign all of your off-duty logs. Weâ€™ve also fixed some bugs.
We added notifications for trucks not ready for the Dec. 16 ELD Deadline and will display Carrier Name and Address overrides made in the web application. We also fixed some bugs.
Bluetooth reliability has been improved, particularly when the app is in the background. Users of BigRoad for ELD are now required to have a driver role. We also fixed some bugs.
ELD Data Diagnostic and Malfunction updates. Additional bug fixes.
Driver Log Events have been updated to show the start time and duration down to the second in the Daily Logs and in Inspection Mode.
Performance improvements.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
MANDATORY UPDATE for ELD Compliance for users on versions older than 28.8.7. This release includes enhancements to the Data Diagnostics and Malfunctions visibility and bug fixes.
We improved the layout of the US ELD Inspection Mode to make it easier to find everything and we fixed some bugs.

In this release we added some warnings to help you stay compliant. There is now an unidentified driver warning when you drive your ELD equipped vehicle without being logged in to BigRoad. We also added warnings when non-standard characters are used that will cause issues with eRODS files and warnings when you have log days that require your signature. We also fixed some bugs.
Bug Fixes
Bug Fix
Updated to support U.S. Hours of Service rule changes
Violation calculations and display for new U.S. HOS rules have been corrected. We have also corrected a situation that was causing the app to freeze on Samsung tablets.

The ELD User Manual and Driver Card are now available from U.S. Inspection Mode without internet connection so itâ€™s always accessible.
Weâ€™ve made improvements to submitting eRODS via Email and other minor enhancements, bug fixes and performance improvements.
Drivers will now be notified if a fleet admin changes their access to use Personal Conveyance or Yard Move. We also fixed some bugs.
We fixed an issue connecting to DashLink in some circumstances

US drivers using Split Sleeper rules can now choose whether to display their HOS timers according to Split Sleeper rules or use the regular cycle timers. The option is displayed after the first qualifying sleeper period is taken.
Bug fixes

1. Connect automatically to co-drivers using the new Team Driving feature
2. UNDO a previously claimed unidentified driving event
3. As per Play store policy, we now ask for device foreground and background location permission w prominent disclosure

1. Connect automatically to co-drivers using the new Team Driving feature
